thread.title: Deputy head, 35, ‘ordered schoolgirl, 16, to strip naked in woods before touching him sexually’
thread.title_full: Deputy head, 35, ‘ordered schoolgirl, 16, to strip naked in woods before touching him sexually’

author: gsandeman
title: Deputy head, 35, ‘ordered schoolgirl, 16, to strip naked in woods before touching him sexually’
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments A FORMER deputy headteacher got a 16-year-old girl drunk and made her take her clothes off in a wood before convincing her to touch him sexually. 
A disciplinary hearing was told that Jonathan Norbury, 35, also made the girl walk home at midnight after their encounter. Wales News Service A disciplinary hearing was told Jonathan Norbury took a teenage girl into the woods, got her drunk and took her clothes off before sexually touching him Wales News Service 4 The former deputy headteacher, here on his wedding day with his wife Katie, is facing a hearing by the Education Workforce Council who could ban him 
Two years ago he was cleared in court of historic sex offences concerning two underage girls. 
He now faces an Education Workforce Council hearing where he could be banned from teaching forever. RELATED STORIES Two teachers suspended from prestigious private school after being accused of sex attacks on pupils TEACHERS PETTING Teacher, 27, faces 20 years in jail after having sex with pupil, 13, she seduced on social media TWISTED MISS JAILED Married teacher, 25, had sex with pupil, 16, in her home and the park after seducing him SEX PROBE Teacher, 27, accused of having sex with underage pupil and 'making a sex tape' after 'plying him with vodka' PERVY TEACHER Drama teacher told female pupil to act 'as if she was begging to give him a b*** ***' ‘IT WAS A MISS-TAKE’ Sex-crazed teacher jailed for 30 YEARS after romping with three pupils makes bid to get out of jail MISS PIGGY BANK Teacher 'had sex with student then paid him £22,000 after he BLACKMAILED her about their affair' 
The hearing was told Norbury allegedly got the teenager, known as Girl C, to take her clothes off before “making her” walk home in the early hours of the morning. 
Case Presenter Cadi Dewi asked Norbury: “Taking her into the woods when she was just 16, getting her drunk on alcohol, taking her clothes off, engaging in sexual touching then making her walk home at midnight – would you say this is unacceptable professional misconduct?” 
Norbury, a father-of-three, accepted the late-night liaison with the girl took place but said she was over 18 and a “willing participant”. Athena Picture Agency 4 Two years ago Norbury was cleared of historic sexual abuse concerning two girls 
He said: “If she was under 18, yes. But she was over the age of 18 … I don’t know what her motivations are for saying this, but she was a consenting adult at the time.” 
He added: “She was a willing participant. There was no force.” 
Norbury faces six allegations relating to three teenage girls and admitted that a relationship with another girl – Girl B – was “inappropriate” due to their nine-year age gap. Athena Picture Agency 4 He was sacked from a primary school in Swansea following an investigation 
However, he denied sending her inappropriate texts as well as kissing and sexually touching her when she was 15. 
He said he had received texts from the girl as a teenager but that she had turned 18 before they had a “fling”. 
Norbury said: “We would meet up, but she was a consenting adult. She was 18. Never younger than that.” 
Norbury also admitted to having sex with a virgin teenage girl – Girl A – on his parents’ lounge floor but denies it happening before she turned 16. 
Girl A told the hearing that Norbury “knew [her] background and he was taking advantage of it” and that “as soon as I turned 16 he took everything because he could”.
